hooks.command: read -r INPUT; CMD=$(echo "$INPUT" | sed 's/.*"command": *"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/'); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE '\bgit\s+push\b'; then echo '{"decision":"block","reason":"git push is blocked by overstory â€” merge locally, push manually when ready"}'; exit 0; fi;
read -r INPUT; TOOL_NAME=$(echo "$INPUT" | sed 's/.*"tool_name": *"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/'); ov log tool-start --agent orchestrator --tool-name "$TOOL_NAME"
read -r INPUT; TOOL_NAME=$(echo "$INPUT" | sed 's/.*"tool_name": *"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/'); ov log tool-end --agent orchestrator --tool-name "$TOOL_NAME"
read -r INPUT; if echo "$INPUT" | grep -q 'git commit'; then mulch diff HEAD~1 2>/dev/null || true; fi
